species.name: gyarados
descriptions: A tale is told of a town that angered Gyarados. Before the sun rose the next day, flames utterly consumed the town, leaving not a trace behind.
Brutally vicious and enormously destructive. Known for totally destroying cities in ancient times.
In ancient literature, there is a record of a Gyarados that razed a village when violence flared.
I suspect this Pokémon to be the true identity of a dragon written of in ancient texts, which claimed that it razed an entire village with white-hot beams from its maw.
It appears whenever there is world conflict, burning down any place it travels through.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: moxie
abilities.effect: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.
